alert.note: Alert for Aitkin; St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 6:47PM CDT until June 23 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Duluth MN has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Aitkin County in east central Minnesota... Southwestern St. Louis County in northeastern Minnesota... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 646 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northeast of Big Sandy Lake, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Floodwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
